Prerequisite(s): Three cursed razor maneuvers
Range: Melee attack
Target: One creature
Duration: Instant

Description

This cruel and unusual strike traps its victims in a waking nightmare. Make a melee attack. If it hits, it deals weapon damage as normal plus 4 points of damage to the target's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. At the beginning of each of your turns thereafter, the target must succeed at a Will save (DC 18 + your initiation modifier) or take an additional 4 points of damage to its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. A successful save or the creature's death ends this effect.
